history.author: todd_jeffreys
history.post: I saw the History channel show. Very interesting to say the least. I admit I am a fence sitter on it being the actual burial shroud of Jesus, but I do lean towards the side of it being authentic with everything I have read/seen/heard. I wonder if a similar STURP type investigation done today would turn up any additional evidence that may not have been uncovered in the previous examination..
history.title: First Reaction: History Channel’s Shroud of Turin: The Real Face of Jesus
